Articles.Content:
I was worried because I ran out of fuel as soon as I got into an orbit around moho, but I remembered I had a special command pod with some rockets on it, so i was able to land safely.

Behold! THE SUN!
Great job!My first other planet was Duna , visited it today in a manned craft.Even if Duna was my first , i spend some time around Jool's moons.

Well, it looks like there's no intent to return from there...

Congratulations!

Wow! Moho is a hard first planet to visit, considering that it can take around 7000 or 8000 m/s Dv to get there, and it has a very inclined orbit with no atmosphere to aerobrake in. I've only managed to return from it once.

Good job!
Getting an orbit around that place was enough for me. Maybe try a landing later on.
Congratulations! But your first planet is Moho? I've landed nearly everywhere and STILL not Moho.
Landing on it was an accident, I was trying to get to Eve but I went a little to far and happened to get an encounter with Moho, so I went there instead.

Landing on it was an accident, I was trying to get to Eve but I went a little to far and happened to get an encounter with Moho, so I went there instead.

Look, another reason we are not NASA.

Congrats!
